import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getDogs } from '../../actions'; import { SearchBar } from '../SearchBar/SearchBar'; import './home.css'; export const Home = () => { const useDispatch = useDispatch(); const AllDogs = useSelector( (state) => state.dogs);//extrae el state global del reducer //PAGUINADO const [ CunrrentPage, setCunrrentPage] = useState(1); //guarda estado inicial de mi web const [ DogsPage, setDogsPage] = useState(15);//videogames x paguina const indexOfLastDogs = CunrrentPage * DogsPage; //indice de mi ultimo videoGames x paguina const indexOfFirstDogs = indexOfLastDogs - DogsPage; //indice del primero const currentVideoGames = AllDogs.slice(indexOfFirstDogs,indexOfLastDogs); return (
